channel.title: Christianity on the Curve
channel.itunes:subtitle: Demystifying tech decision-making! Two developers and a human being discuss the difficult world of technology, business, and building software that matters.

item.title: Ep 2: Drive to Franklin
item.author: Micah Redding
item.itunes:subtitle: Micah and Ryan have a weird Starbucks experience, drive to Franklin, reference Disney and Jay-Z, and talk about what it means to be a person - or a God.
item.itunes:summary: Micah and Ryan have a weird Starbucks experience, drive to Franklin, reference Disney and Jay-Z, and talk about what it means to be a person - or a God.

item.title: Ep 1: The idea of practical theology
item.author: Micah Redding
item.itunes:subtitle: Micah and Ryan pour coffee loudly, discuss the pointlessness of philosophy, invent practical theology, prove the existence of God, and have a touching moment.
